mapper.insert: insert into pet_post (post_id, user_id, post_content, post_images, post_view, post_like, created_at, updated_at) values (#{postId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postImages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postView,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postLike,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update pet_post set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, post_content = #{postContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_images = #{postImages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_view = #{postView,jdbcType=INTEGER}, post_like = #{postLike,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where post_id = #{postId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select post_id, user_id, post_content, post_images, post_view, post_like, created_at, updated_at from pet_post where post_id = #{postId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select post_id, user_id, post_content, post_images, post_view, post_like, created_at, updated_at from pet_post
